channel.title: MLB on Data Scientology
channel.description: Recent content in MLB on Data Scientology

item.title: Histograms 101
item.description: Let’s create a histogram that analyzes the body weight distribution of all MLB baseball players. First, we must upload the three necessary libraries needed to perform the histogram function. These three include the Lahman, sqldf, and ggplot2 libraries. library(Lahman) library(sqldf) ## Loading required package: gsubfn ## Loading required package: proto ## Warning in doTryCatch(return(expr), name, parentenv, handler): unable to load shared object '/Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Resources/modules//R_X11.so': ## dlopen(/Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Resources/modules//R_X11.so, 6): Library not loaded: /opt/X11/lib/libSM.6.dylib ## Referenced from: /Library/Frameworks/R.

item.title: Histograms-101
item.description: Let’s create a histogram that analyzes the body weight distribution of all MLB baseball players. First, we must upload the three necessary libraries needed to perform the histogram function. These three include the Lahman, sqldf, and ggplot2 libraries. library(Lahman) library(sqldf) ## Loading required package: gsubfn ## Loading required package: proto ## Warning in doTryCatch(return(expr), name, parentenv, handler): unable to load shared object '/Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Resources/modules//R_X11.so': ## dlopen(/Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Resources/modules//R_X11.so, 6): Library not loaded: /opt/X11/lib/libSM.6.dylib ## Referenced from: /Library/Frameworks/R.
